name: Unruly Spectators
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A 60 foot radius circle becomes exposed to a crowd of fey, eagerly watching the events that unfold. Whenever a creature other than you inside this area fails an attack roll, the fey ridicule them with words laced with magic, dealing 1d8 psychic damage.

If you leave the area, the spell ends. If the spell ends early for any reason, the crowd boos and hisses at you, dealing 3d8 psychic damage.
